message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a bit more, but that offer isn't fair to me. Let's try to be more equitable this time.
Let's meet in the middle of our previous offers
The value of the deal is decreasing with each round. I'm willing to be generous, but I need you to meet me closer to the middle.
You're losing value, I'm not. Take this before it gets worse
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The deal is getting worse for both of us.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this now before we both lose out.
